message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you is approximately $1500000. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a price that reflects its true value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product for $1200000. This offer is designed to maximize your investment while allowing me to achieve a substantial return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
